Module bestSokobanEverV6
Package display

Class GameCore

java.lang.Object
display.GameCore
public class GameCore
extends java.lang.Object
This class stores some core methods to run the game.
Since:
1.0
Version:
2.0
Author:
Zhengtian CHU

  • Method Details

    • GetMapSetName

      public static java.lang.String GetMapSetName()

    • SetMapSetName

      public static void SetMapSetName​(java.lang.String mapSetName)

    • InitializeGame

      public static void InitializeGame​(java.io.InputStream input)
      This method will be called when the game starts and need to be initialized. This method will manufacture a GameEngine from EngineFactoryPattern and try to create a music player. And then it will judge whether the current level has been finished(using when loading game not from default file). Later, it will goes to reloadGrid() method.
      Parameters:
      input - the stream of game map file
      See Also:
      GameEngine, MusicPlayer, GamePageModel, ReloadGrid()

    • SetEventFilter

      public static void SetEventFilter()
      This method set an event filter to handle the operation from keyBoard by calling handleKey().
      See Also:
      GamePageModel, GameEngine, ReloadGrid()

    • LoadGameFile

      public static void LoadGameFile() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      This function is called when player wants to load the existing map file in their local. The method will create a FileChooser to choose the file, and then saving file in GamePageModel and initialize the game.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file could be found
      See Also:
      GameEngine, GamePageModel, FileChooser, InitializeGame(InputStream)

    • LoadGameFile

      public static java.util.List<Level> LoadGameFile​(java.io.InputStream input)
      Load the levels in the game file to the levels list. Using BufferedReader.readLine() to read line by line in the reader. Using rawLevel to store the lines in level. Using levels to store the parsed levels.
      Parameters:
      input - the stream of game map file
      Returns:
      the list of levels
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if cannot open the request file.
      See Also:
      ArrayList, BufferedReader, InputStreamReader(InputStream), GameLogger

    • ReloadGrid

      public static void ReloadGrid()
      This method will get the level of the game and add the object to the game grid. If the game is completed, the method will calculate the whole time the player used and show then in a ScoreBoard.
      See Also:
      Level, Level.LevelIterator, AddObjectToGrid(GameObject, Point), GameEngine, GamePageModel

    • AddObjectToGrid

      public static void AddObjectToGrid​(GameObject gameObject, java.awt.Point location)
      This method add the graphic objects from class GraphicObject to the grid of game.
      Parameters:
      gameObject - the game object need to be added to map
      location - the location of objects
      See Also:
      GameObject, GraphicObject, GameGrid, GamePageModel.GetGameGrid()
